item.title: JPMorgan Chase partners with Coinbase to launch deposit token for institutional clients
item.description: Each JPMD token will represent a deposit claim against JPMorgan Chase.

item.title: Why Palo Alto Networks is focusing on just a few big gen AI bets
item.description: Palo Alto Networks has been highly selective in betting on generative AI, to get the best bang for her buck.

item.title: Unless the Trump family secretly built a U.S. factory, industry experts say the $500 Made in America smartphone is a fantasy
item.description: The Trump Organization's promise of a U.S.-built phone flies in the face of years of domestic manufacturing realities.

item.title: China’s MiniMax debuts M1 AI model that it says costs 200x less to train than OpenAI’s GPT-4
item.description: The claims may spook investors who’ve sunk billions into leading AI companies such as OpenAI and Anthropic
